mapper.select: select * from lib order by lib_no asc
mapper.update: update lib set lib_no = #{libNo}, lib_book_no = #{libBookNo}, lib_lib_info_no = #{libLibInfoNo}, lib_amount = #{libAmount} where lib_no = #{libNo}
mapper.select: select * from lib where instr(lib_lib_info_no, #{libLibInfoNo}) > 0 order by lib_lib_info_no asc
select linfo.library_name, b.book_title from lib_info linfo, book b, lib l where l.lib_book_no = b.book_no and linfo.lib_info_no = l.lib_lib_info_no and l.lib_no = #{libNo};
